revision.text:
The '''X Click''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's Click Attack for 60 seconds. ===Description=== Double your click attack for 60 seconds! ===Acquisition=== X Click can be purchased at the Saffron City Shop for 3000 coins. {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} |} |} == Trivia == While X Click is original to PokeClicker, it uses the same sprite as X Defense from the official games. {{Battle items}}
[[Category:Items]]
